issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Don't allow bare_trait_objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6104](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6104). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Need to remove "<font color="#808080">#![allow(bare_trait_objects)]" from cargo.toml and fix compiler warnings
</font>

comments.body:
